entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem with interception StandardOutput in Linux #73923
  • Resolve ILVerify assembly references from `.deps.json`. #73922
  • [arm64] Unexpected performance degradation for Vector128<short> #73921
    7.0.0
  • Ubuntu Server 20.04 SO_REUSEPORT throws System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (95): Operation not supported #73920
  • Maui App after update Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client to 6.0.8 release build crash without error message #73916
  • Configuration binding swallows the conversion exception #73915
  • "hotReloadEnabled": false does not work #73909

Closed

  • Parsing NumberStyles.HexNumber with "0x" prefix fails #73924
  • [NativeAOT] Stress crash in ThreadStore::DetachCurrentThread #73116
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Tests failing to build with trimming #73901
    8.0.0
  • Developers need faster interop between JavaScript and C# to be able to port large apps to webassembly #44330
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.WebProxy Bypass regex list reconstructed for every call to IsBypassed #73703
    Future
  • Performance has doubled since a couple of days ago. #73891
  • AssemblyLoadContext issue, needs better documentation or default behavior for AssemblyLoadContext #73900
    Future
  • Missing authorship information on 70 - 80 commits authored by @4creators #69968
    Future
  • Test failure: WasmTestOnBrowser-subtlecrypto-System.Security.Cryptography.Tests #73872
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Hook up webworker console to xharness websockets #72606
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Don't hardcode PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE #68397
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Publish `dotnet.worker.js` #68509
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] warning WASM0001: Could not get pinvoke, or callbacks for method 'EnumUILanguages' because 'Parsing function pointer types in signatures is not supported.' #73880

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging a test #73917
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add generation of structured object file dumps #73913
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Filter out Tailscale from LinkLocal address list #73911
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Use {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept in RegexCompiler and source generator #73910
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Fix a stress crash in thread detach at process shutdown. #73912
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Safer state handling in distributed transactions #73918
    area-System.Transactions
  • Clean up temp directory methods in System.ComponentModel.Composition tests #73857
    area-System.ComponentModel.Composition
  • System.Net.WebProxy Bypass regex list optimization #73803
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Copy the string instead of returning different pointers #73795
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix and simplify __has_builtin conditions #73905
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Misc tests related fixes #73884
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Use asset loading for dotnet.worker.js; update WasmAppBuilder #73697
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix runtime pack aliasing #73885
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Repoint urls in docs #73766
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify MaxResponseHeadersLength calculations #73907
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] cleanup testing and host support in templatest and tests #73785
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #73871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize LastIndexOf and LastIndexOfAnyExcept without code duplication #73768
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Memory
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix "command is not pending" #72953
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Avoid unused NetEventSource code #73868
    area-System.Net
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • JIT: extend forward sub to local fields #73719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add extra NativeAOT test legs #73547
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAot] Enable a couple more libs tests #73756
    area-System.Net
  • fix handling of client cert on macOS #73574
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Add JSON Int128 and UInt128 support #73892
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
